title: Video: Frank Ocean – Novacane
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/novacane.jpg "novacane")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8619-video-frank-ocean-novacane/attachment/novacane)

As if we needed any more confirmation, we are in the age of progressive and intelligent Rn’B. With **The Weeknd**’s Mixtape being lapped up by underground kids and the mainstream alike, it seems like the perfect time for **Frank Ocean** to drop the video for his radio crossover tune, _Novocane_.

And what a video it is. Shot in one take/shot, disturbingly distorted and smutty imagery are gently overlaid on the ominous main shot.  Out of the whole of **OFWGKTA, Frank Ocean** has been the most confident with playing with genre convention, he also seems to be just as confident with playing with the very fabric  of what a music video can achieve.
